member.name: IDirectManipulationDragDropEventHandler.OnDragDropStatusChange
member.summary: Called when a status change happens in the viewport that the drag-and-drop behavior is attached to.
member.param: The current state of the drag-drop interaction from DIRECTMANIPULATION_DRAG_DROP_STATUS.
The previous state of the drag-drop interaction from DIRECTMANIPULATION_DRAG_DROP_STATUS.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Defines methods to handle drag-drop behavior events.
summary.div: Note When implementing this interface, ensure that the implementation supports multithreading through thread-safe reference counting. For more information, see and .
